message: Let's be fair, Bob. I get 60 and you get 40. It's a good deal for you in the first round.
I think it's fair that we split the money more evenly. Since I get to propose this time, I'll take a slightly bigger share, but it's still a good deal for both of us.
Bob, time is money!  I'm increasing my share because your options are literally shrinking. It's 65 for me or we play another round.
